tier.item: (18) Zhongguo, difang hen da. e, renkou hen duo. e, tudi hen feiwo. e, qihou ye hen hao. e,
China place very big population very many land very fertile climate too very good
`(As for) China, (its) land area is very large. (Its) population is very big. (Its) land is very fertile. (Its)
climate is also very good. We all like (it).'
